references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of diffusion models, establishing their superiority over GANs in image generation, which is directly relevant to the current work.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced a crucial advancement in diffusion models by enabling high-resolution image synthesis, a critical factor for the proposed method.
This paper introduced the foundational concept of denoising diffusion models, which is the basis for the single-step diffusion method being studied.
This paper directly addresses challenges in single-step diffusion, using adversarial training for improved fidelity, and is directly compared with in the current work.
This paper presents a state-of-the-art approach to single-step diffusion, which the current paper aims to improve upon.
